Title: detectLanguageUnknown
Description: Similar to the detectLanguage function, except the detectLanguageUnknown function works with non-UTF8-encoded strings. Prefer this version when your character set is UTF-16 or UTF-32.
text_to_be_analyzed — A collection (or sentences) of strings to analyze. String.
The 2-letter ISO code of the detected language
un = unknown, can not detect any language.other = the detected language does not have 2 letter code.
Examples: SELECT detectLanguageUnknown('Ich bleibe für ein paar Tage.');
